name: platform
posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

dsense.name: platform
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: a flat raised area or structure
a long, flat raised structure at a railway station, where people get on and off trains

example.eg: The next train for Aberdeen will depart from platform 9.
example.egtrans: 下一趟去阿伯丁的火车将从9号站台开出。

trans_examp.trans_en: the raised part of the floor in a large room, from which you make a speech or give a musical performance

example.eg: Speaker after speaker mounted/took the platform to denounce the policy.
example.egtrans: 演讲者一个接一个走上讲台谴责这项政策。

example.eg: This brilliant young violinist has appeared on concert platforms all round the world.
example.egtrans: 这名才华横溢的年轻小提琴手曾在世界各地的音乐会舞台上演出。

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: the people who are up on a platform in order to speak to an audience

example.eg: An elderly lady stood up and said she had a question for the platform.
example.egtrans: 一个年老的女士站起来说，有一个问题要问讲台上的人。

example.eg: The platform party (= the group on the platform) applauded loudly.

dsense.name: platform
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: an opportunity to make your ideas or beliefs known publicly
trans_examp.trans_cn: （公开表达看法或信仰的）机会，讲坛

example.eg: By refusing to give us a grant to make this programme, they are denying us a platform.
example.egtrans: 他们通过拒绝给我们提供组织这项活动的资金，剥夺了我们的发言权。

trans_examp.trans_en: all the things that a political party promises to do if they are elected

example.eg: We campaigned on a platform of low taxation.
example.egtrans: 我们竞选的纲领是降低税率。

dsense.name: platform
dsense.posTip: A word that refers to a person, place, idea, event or thing.

trans_examp.trans_en: the type of computer system or smartphone you are using, in relation to the type of software (= computer programs) you can use on it
trans_examp.trans_cn: 平台（指使用的计算机系统和软件）

example.eg: This new personal banking software can be used with any Windows platform.
example.egtrans: 这款新的个人银行软件可与任何版本的视窗操作平台兼容。

example.eg: Both Apple's iOS and Google's Android mobile platforms now have emoji keyboards built into their software.
example.egtrans: 苹果的iOS和谷歌的Android手机系统现在都在软件中安装了内置表情键盘。
